title: taNikEshanai paNindu
sahitya:
taNikEshanai paNindhu pADat-taNiyum manakkavalai tirut-


anupallavi

  piNi Ayiram orushEra uDalaip-pIDai sheidAlum uyir vADa sheidAlum


caraNam    vEda shAstra purANangaLai namba mATTEn engirAi
mElOr anubhava vAyilAi pughalvadellAm maDamai engirAi
nAthanai vaLLi deivAnai maNALanai muruganai orumurai bhajanai shei manamE
nADu muzhudhum unaip-pOTrip pugazhum nalam ellAm tEDi varumE tirut-
